# Olivier Halupczok

> GenAI Engineer with 3 years building AI products and 6 years in software engineering. Specializes in production chatbots, multi-agent systems, and RAG pipelines.

Olivier is a GenAI Engineer based in Poland. He is a member of the AI Working Group assisting the Polish Ministry of Digital Affairs on AI adoption strategy. Expert in AI-enhanced development with tools like Cursor and Claude Code.

## Contact

- [Email](mailto:olivierhalupczok@gmail.com): Direct contact
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/olivier-halupczok/): Professional profile
- [GitHub](https://github.com/olivierhalupczok): Code repositories
- [Book a call](https://calendly.com/olivierhalupczok/30min): Schedule a 30-minute meeting

## Expertise

### LLMs & Agents
OpenAI, Claude, PydanticAI, Dspy, LangChain, LangGraph, CrewAI, Guardrails

### RAG & ML
RAG pipelines, Vector databases, Embeddings, LLM evaluation, Prompt engineering, Agentic AI

### Cloud & Infrastructure
GCP Vertex AI, AWS, Vercel, Supabase, Docker, CI/CD

### Full-stack
Python, FastAPI, TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, React, Angular, PostgreSQL

## Featured Projects

1. **Voice-to-Voice AI English Tutor**: AI-driven English learning product with real-time 1:1 lessons. Hybrid LLM stack with speech models (STT/TTS/S2S), GCP infrastructure for GPU inference, multi-agent system for adaptive lesson generation.

2. **Multi-agent Automation Center**: B2B task automation with Gmail/Outlook integration. Continuously gathers context, groups messages, automates calendars, executes tasks based on email content.

3. **Radio Analytics Big Data System**: Production system analyzing global radio signals. Migrated Java to Python, reduced costs 65%, added real-time anomaly detection with ML.
